Ref: CXP022/2023
Closing date: 27 February 2023

Ensure that all Compliance, Quality Assurance, Health, Safety and Environmental work practices within this job function are conducted safely and ensure that all hazards are identified and controlled

Location: Bluff, Durban

Salary: R4 000 – R4 500

Main Duties include:

•Use correct PPE and comply by company policies and procedures, safety standards and regulations

•Empty wax and wastepaper bins in the morning and the afternoon

•Sweep, scrub, mop and wipe all surface areas

•Wash glassware when necessary

•Clean the doors and windows – Front and Back

•Make sure the sample storeroom is always clean and neat

•Clean inside the slop area

•Ensure all equipment is cleaned according to procedure & safety standards

•Clean counter tops and cupboard doors

•Maintain good stacking and packing processes in the storage warehouse

•Ensure mops, brooms, scoop is clean and packed away

•Clean surfaces when spills happen

•Wipe floors regularly especially on rainy days

•Assist with receiving stock

Criteria:

•NQF Level 4 (Matric)

•Good English communication skills

•Must live in the Bluff surrounding area
